page.title: 12LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: { YOUTH CLUB AND PLAY SCHOOL Page Hill Middle School Youth Club is held from 19.00 to 21.00 on Mondays. Activities include: cookery,table tennis and sewing. St. Rumbolds Playgroup is at the bottom of Page Hill. It has heating,playing fields and other facilities.{ { ROLLERAMA This disco on skates is held in the community centre on Mondays from 17.30 to 19.00,price 1.45. {THE RIDING STABLES. The Riding School started in 1925, originally for Stowe School. There are 17 horses and ponies,and 3 horses belonging to other people which are kept in livery stables. Children from 4 schools,aged about 5 years upwards, are taught each week. The price is 3 (adults) and 1.50 (children).
